greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Chebyshev polynomial of the first kind T(n,x), evaluated at x=n.
reference: M. Rosenblum and J. Rovnyak, Hardy Classes and Operator Theory, Dover, New York, 1985, page 18.
G. Szego, Orthogonal polynomials, Amer. Math. Soc., Providence, 1939, p. 29.
G. Freud, Orthogonal Polynomials, Pergamon Press, Oxford, 1966, p. 35.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..351
formula: a(n) = (A323118(n) - A107995(n-2))/2 for n > 1. - _Seiichi Manyama_, Mar 05 2021
a(n) = n * Sum_{k=0..n} (2*n-2)^k * binomial(n+k,2*k)/(n+k) for n > 0. - _Seiichi Manyama_, Mar 05 2021
program: (PARI) a(n) = if(n==0, 1, n*sum(k=0, n, (2*n-2)^k*binomial(n+k, 2*k)/(n+k))); \\ _Seiichi Manyama_, Mar 05 2021
results.author: _Roger L. Bagula_, Mar 01 2006
ext: Edited by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Apr 05 2006
